class.name: EditorExportPreset
class.description: Represents the configuration of an export preset, as created by the editor's export dialog. An [EditorExportPreset] instance is intended to be used a read-only configuration passed to the [EditorExportPlatform] methods when exporting the project.

method.name: are_advanced_options_enabled
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the "Advanced" toggle is enabled in the export dialog.

method.name: get_custom_features
method.description: Returns a comma-separated list of custom features added to this preset, as a string. See [url=$DOCS_URL/tutorials/export/feature_tags.html]Feature tags[/url] in the documentation for more information.

method.name: get_customized_files
method.description: Returns a dictionary of files selected in the "Resources" tab of the export dialog. The dictionary's keys are file paths, and its values are the corresponding export modes: [code]"strip"[/code], [code]"keep"[/code], or [code]"remove"[/code]. See also [method get_file_export_mode].

method.name: get_customized_files_count
method.description: Returns the number of files selected in the "Resources" tab of the export dialog.

method.name: get_encrypt_directory
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if PCK directory encryption is enabled in the export dialog.

method.name: get_encrypt_pck
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if PCK encryption is enabled in the export dialog.

method.name: get_encryption_ex_filter
method.description: Returns file filters to exclude during PCK encryption.

method.name: get_encryption_in_filter
method.description: Returns file filters to include during PCK encryption.

method.name: get_encryption_key
method.description: Returns PCK encryption key.

method.name: get_exclude_filter
method.description: Returns file filters to exclude during export.

method.name: get_export_filter
method.description: Returns export file filter mode selected in the "Resources" tab of the export dialog.

method.name: get_export_path
method.description: Returns export target path.

method.name: get_file_export_mode
method.description: Returns file export mode for the specified file.

method.name: get_files_to_export
method.description: Returns array of files to export.

method.name: get_include_filter
method.description: Returns file filters to include during export.

method.name: get_or_env
method.description: Returns export option value or value of environment variable if it is set.

method.name: get_patches
method.description: Returns the list of packs on which to base a patch export on.

method.name: get_preset_name
method.description: Returns this export preset's name.

method.name: get_project_setting
method.description: Returns the value of the setting identified by [param name] using export preset feature tag overrides instead of current OS features.

method.name: get_script_export_mode
method.description: Returns the export mode used by GDScript files. [code]0[/code] for "Text", [code]1[/code] for "Binary tokens", and [code]2[/code] for "Compressed binary tokens (smaller files)".

method.name: get_version
method.description: Returns the preset's version number, or fall back to the [member ProjectSettings.application/config/version] project setting if set to an empty string. If [param windows_version] is [code]true[/code], formats the returned version number to be compatible with Windows executable metadata.

method.name: has
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the preset has the property named [param property].

method.name: has_export_file
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the file at the specified [param path] will be exported.

method.name: is_dedicated_server
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the dedicated server export mode is selected in the export dialog.

method.name: is_runnable
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the "Runnable" toggle is enabled in the export dialog.
